name: kuflow-rest-client
// 1: IMPORTANT: 'openapi' script requires JAVA 11 (JAVA 17 not supported)

scripts.license:examples: poetry run licenseheaders -v -v -s etc/licenseheaders/custom-settings.json -t LICENSE -d examples
scripts.license:src: poetry run licenseheaders -v -v -s etc/licenseheaders/custom-settings.json -t LICENSE -d src
scripts.license: npm run license:examples && npm run license:src
scripts.generate: npm run openapi && npm run format:kuflow_rest_client && npm run license
